all._private_document_message_: This is a private document. Only the document owner can perform this action.
all._model_config_message_: Configure the filename, language and NER model you wish to use. Try and create a unique filename to distinguish it from the original. Do not add any extensions (i.e. .xml) to the name. Once submitted, it may take a few minutes for the operation to complete. Once complete the new TEI document will be added to the project.
